FragilityCurve.Description: Costing to be furnished by user. Consequence data assumes 16 SF of damage area.
FragilityCurve.Name: Fragile contents secured by museum putty, Velcro or other weak but sticky stuff
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data. Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence. DamageState.Description: Object falls off shelf or shelf overturns and object breaks or object breaks within cabinet.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace object. Note: user must supply cost of replacement.
